summary: Sam requests a 15-30 minute meeting with Josh later this week at Jimmy V's Sports Café or a Zoom call.

responses.email:
Hi Sam,

That sounds great! I'm available on Thursday afternoon at 3 pm. Let's meet at Jimmy V's Sports Café then. Looking forward to catching up.

Best,
Josh

Hi Sam,

Thank you for reaching out. I'll have to check my schedule and get back to you on the best time to meet up. I'll let you know as soon as I can.

Best,
Josh

Hi Sam,

I'd be happy to chat. What's the purpose of the meeting? I want to make sure it's a good use of both our time. Let me know the details and I'll do my best to accommodate.

Best,
Josh

Hi Sam,

Unfortunately, I'm quite busy this week and don't have any availability for a meeting. Perhaps we could schedule something for next week? I apologize for the inconvenience.

Best,
Josh

full_email:
Hi Josh,

Let me know if you have some time to chat later this week – we can meet for 15-30 mins at Jimmy V’s Sports Café or hop on a zoom call.

Best,
Sam

summary: Jess responded at [day/time] about Joshua's program sheet.

responses.email:
Hi Jess,

Thank you for the feedback on my program sheet. I have updated the units for CS194W and have submitted the revised version to the Smartsheet form. Please let me know if you need any additional information from me.

Best,
Joshua

Hi Jess,

Thank you for reviewing my program sheet. I wanted to clarify the units for CS194W - could you please provide more details on the specific information you need? I want to make sure I include everything accurately in the updated version.

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best,
Joshua

Hi Jess,

I appreciate you taking the time to review my program sheet. Could you please provide more context on the units for CS194W that need to be listed? I want to make sure I understand the requirement fully before submitting the updated version.

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

Best,
Joshua

Dear Jess,

Thank you for your feedback on my program sheet. I have updated the requested information and have resubmitted the revised version to the Smartsheet form.

Please let me know if you require any additional details from me.

Sincerely,
Joshua

full_email:
Hi Joshua,

Thank you for submitting your program sheet! I have reviewed your plans and listed my feedback below:

    Please list the units for CS194W


When you have the availability, send the updated version of your program sheet that reflects these changes to our Smartsheet form. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out!



Best,
Jess

summary: Katie Li invites the team to confirm the 4 members of their team who will be participating in the hackathon this Saturday.

response.email:
Hi Katie,

Thank you for the invitation to the hackathon this Saturday. We have confirmed that the 4 members of our team who will be participating are [Member 1], [Member 2], [Member 3], and [Member 4].

We appreciate your understanding and look forward to the event.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

Hi Katie,

Thank you for reaching out about the hackathon team size. We apologize for the oversight in our application, and we understand the need to maintain fairness for all participants. Could you please confirm if there is any flexibility in the team size limit, or if we need to adjust our team accordingly?

We're excited to participate and want to ensure we're complying with the event guidelines. Please let us know how we can best move forward.

Thank you,
[Your Name]

Hi Katie,

Thank you for the invitation to the hackathon. We appreciate your understanding, but unfortunately, we will not be able to participate with only 4 team members. We had hoped to include all 5 of our team members, as they have been working collaboratively on this project.

We understand the need to maintain fairness for all teams, and we respect the event guidelines. Perhaps we can explore options for participating in a future hackathon with our full team.

Thank you for your consideration,
[Your Name]

Hi Katie,

Thank you for the invitation to the hackathon this Saturday. We're thrilled to participate and are excited to see what we can build.

We've confirmed that the 4 members of our team who will be attending are [Member 1], [Member 2], [Member 3], and [Member 4]. We're confident that this team will work together seamlessly to create something great.

Please let us know if there's anything else we can do to ensure a smooth and successful event. We're looking forward to it!

Best regards,
[Your Name]

full_email:
Hi team,

Thanks all for your interest in the hackathon this Saturday, we're really excited to see what you build!

+Albert for visibility. We noticed that your team may include 5 people, but your application only has 4 members. We'd love for all of you to participate, but we capped teams at 4 members and to keep things fair for the other teams, we're unable to make any exceptions. Who are the 4 members on your team who will be participating?



	
Katie Li

summary: Liam plans to meet Josh at their office at 10:30 AM on Tuesday, April 8th or Thursday, April 10th.

responses.email:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. I will plan to come by on Thursday, April 10th at 10:30 AM. I look forward to seeing you then.

Best,
Josh

Hi Liam,

Thank you for reaching out. To clarify, I will plan to visit your office on Thursday, April 10th at 10:30 AM. Please let me know if this works for you.

Kind regards,
Josh

Hi Liam,

Thank you for the follow-up. Either Tuesday, April 8th or Thursday, April 10th at 10:30 AM works for me. I appreciate you ensuring I can meet with you during my visit. Please let me know which day is better for you.

Sincerely,
Josh

Hi Liam,

Thursday, April 10th at 10:30 AM works for me. I'll see you then.

Best,
Josh

full_email:
Hi Josh,

 

Just to confirm (since I made a mistake in my email), are you planning to come by next Tuesday (4/8) or Thursday (4/10) at 1030am? Sorry for the confusion, but I want to make sure I’m in my office when you stop by!

Yrs,
LP

summary: The sender invites Josh to a meeting next Tuesday at 10:30 am in their office at Encina 421.

responses.email:
Dear LP,

I'm delighted to hear from you and would love to meet next Tuesday at 10:30 am in your office at Encina 421. Thank you for the invitation, and I look forward to our chat.

Best regards,
Josh

Dear LP,

Thank you for the invitation to meet next Tuesday at 10:30 am. Unfortunately, I have a prior commitment that day and won't be able to make it. Would it be possible to reschedule for another time that week? I'm very interested in continuing our conversation and look forward to finding a mutually convenient time.

Best regards,
Josh

Dear LP,

Thank you for the invitation to meet next Tuesday at 10:30 am in your office at Encina 421. Before I confirm, could you please provide a bit more context about the purpose of our meeting? I want to ensure I'm prepared to have a productive discussion.

I appreciate your time, and I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards,
Josh

Hey LP,

Thanks for reaching out. 10:30 am next Tuesday at your office in Encina 421 works great for me. I'm looking forward to our chat.

Catch you then,
Josh

full_email:
Dear Josh,

 

Thanks very much for coming, for your kind words, and for your interest in talking more. I’d love to chat with you. This week is packed for me, but about next Tuesdays (4/10) at 10:30 am. Would that work for you? And yes, let’s meet in my office at Encina 421.

 

Looking forward to it,

LP
